globalMetadata.title: AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator API Documentation
globalMetadata.summary: Connect AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator in your own simulation environment and incorporate your perception stack into the simulation loop.
globalMetadata.description: This document is intended for developers who need to develop client applications communicating with AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator internal services in order to integrate AVxcelerate Sensors Simulator in their driving simulation application or to integrate the System Under Test (SUT) into the simulation loop.
